title: Short-Term Competency Enhancement Program for Social Sector Professionals via MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A MOOC platform and mobile device-based program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, intensively developing competencies to analyze and apply the latest social issues

learning_goals: Learners can analyze five or more core social issues from MOOC platforms and write a comprehensive report.
Learners complete collaborative projects with peer learners three or more times per week using mobile-based microlearning modules.

Learners will propose one solution to a community issue (e.g., improving accessibility of public facilities) in a project-based assessment within one week, incorporate feedback on at least two of three expert evaluation items, and submit a revised final proposal.

resources: Expert-Led Video Lectures in Social Studies

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
